Package pkgMain

Class MoreInfoScreen

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.Screen
pkgMain.MoreInfoScreen
Direct Known Subclasses:
LepMoreInfoScreen, PlantMoreInfoScreen
abstract class MoreInfoScreen
extends Screen
The MoreInfoScreen class displays more info about a plant or lep.
Author:
rbila
